title: News24.com | JUST IN | UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson admitted to hospital for Covid-19 tests - reports
description: UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson has reportedly been admitted to hospital after presenting with Covid-19 symptoms, according to media reports.
content:
UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson has been admitted to hospital after presenting with Covid-19 symptoms, according to his office. 
This comes just two hours after he thanked people for staying at home in a bid to curb the virus. "Stay home, protect the NHS and… [+1304 chars]
